channel.title: Help plz on respawn
channel.description: how do i change your respawn point when u die when i die i go to lumbridge how do i change it to varrock. can somebody help me sorry to post again but nobody well helped me with this so plz help sorry for asking for rep wont happen again.

item.title: Help plz on respawn
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

The following is directed at the person above me.

I do agree that he should have searched to find this, but why not just answer the guys question while you’re here?

The following is the answer to the question

Search for your death message, (in most servers it is…)

Oh Dear you have died

Scroll up a bit, (may be down depending on your source)
And you’ll see the coordinates it teleports you to on death, just edit it from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz on respawn

item.description:
@barelypassing wrote:

Did you google? Did you search the forums? I don’t think so because you’re posting this. Try those before you post.

Read full topic
